alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued December 15 at 4:57AM EST until December 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Waves on Lake Superior building to as high as 21 feet leading to significant lakeshore flooding for the western shoreline of the Keweenaw Peninsula. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to midnight EST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
